comment_0: This song appears to be about how he, well, thinks his life is a waste of time, and how the 'you' he often references (probably a love) is in comparison, perfect. He's a head case, will wreck what he loves most, but she's the opera, always on time and in tune. He's saying how love (his love, at least,) is nothing more than a Polaroid, looks great in pictures, but it'll never fill the void he has.
comment_1: He would never meet someone who he blends well with. Every relationship he finds himself in never seem to work out. He doesn't allow it to get him down. He keeps moving forward knowing that to have that "perfect Kodak relationship" is only a dream.
